addAggregatedCompoundDocumentBegining: In this type, the four steps are activated in the sense that this document has grouped compound documents and attachments
addAggregatedCompoundDocumentInduction: add Aggregated Document with attachment induction
addAggregatedDocumentBegining: In such documents there are only three steps, And the final step (Add Attachment) is not activated as following
addAggregatedDocumentInduction: add Aggregated Document without attachments induction
addDocClass_Step1: Select Document Class from the sidebar
addDocumentToSetStep5: search for the desired document by free text or by value
addMetaDataModel_AddModelAttribuits: Now you need to provide the attributes names and types of this model.fill in the required information then click next. Finally review the model then click create if you are done, or back if you need to edit anything from the previous steps.
addMetaDataModel_DetectType: Now you can choose the model properties,whether it is a compound model,aggregated model or both
addMetaDataModel_EnterName: fill in the desired metadata model name.
addMetaDataModel_ModelsTypes: You will be asked to provide the name of the attachment if you select 'is Compound' option, and to provide the aggregate name if you select 'is Aggregated' option. fill in the required information then click next. note that you can always add model that it is neither compound nor aggregated, in this case just click next without checking any option.
addMetaDataModel_SelectClass: then select the document class of this model
addMetaDataModel_SelectMetaDataModel: Select Metadata model from the sidebar
addMetaDataModel_SelectModelType: select the type of the model
addNaturalDocumentBegining: In this type, adding is done in two steps, as there are no attachments or aggregated documents, and it is as follows
addNaturalDocumentInduction: add natural document without attachment induction
addNaturalDocumentWithAttachmentBegining: Here, the third step (adding a compound document) is not activated in this case, so the steps for adding are as follows
addNaturalDocumentWithAttachmentInductio: add natural document with attachment induction
addNewUserStep1: from the upper right corner, click on your avatar, select settings then Add New User.
addNewUserStep2: fill in the required information then click SIGN UP.
addOrphanDocumentSetStep1: Select Document Set from the sidebar
addOrphanDocumentSetStep3: click on the '+' sign then select Add New Set Here
addOrphanDocumentSetStep4: fill in the required information then click Submit
addSubDocumentSetStep2: double click on the folder you need to add a new set in it.
addSubDocumentSetStep3: click on the '+' sign then select Add Document To Set
addSubDocumentSetStep4: click the '+ sign then select Add New Set Here then fill in the required information
aggregatedFillingDoc: search for the required document by free text or by value.
aggregatedFillingDoc_AggregatedDoc_comp: you will need to ADD AGGREGATED DO and ATTACH a file
aggregatedFillingDoc_SearchResult: select the required document to add as aggregate as shown below
aggregatedmodelincludes: It is an aggregate model includes

alert_exiteupdating: You are about to exit updating this document, Check the Changes Before Leaving ...
archiveSteps: click on the archive icon as below :
attachmentillingDoc_ClickAdd: Click ATTACH to add an attachment
attachmentillingDoc_SubmittedDone: 3.A message will appear to you if the document is created successfully.
caption: Caption
cofigureEmailStep1: from the upper right corner click on your avatar, then select settings. From settings select Configure Email.
cofigureEmailStep2: fill in the rquired email then click setup email configuration as below :

compoundmodelincludes: It is a compound model includes
creatdocument_uploadingfilleddoc: The filled document and its attachments are uploading..
deleteDocumentSteps: After browsing documents, select trash can to delete the document
dialog_previewchooseddocument: You can preview the choosed document before select it.
dialog_selectaggregateddocument: To select an aggregated document, please choose one from the drop list.
dialog_selectedbefore: The file was selected before, you should select another file.
dialog_doucmentTable_confirmDeleteDocume: You are about to delete a Document, Are you sure you want to delete this document?
dialog_doucmentTable_confirmArchiveDocum: You are about to archive a Document, Are you sure you want to Archive this document?
dialog_documentSet_confirmDeleteDocument: You are about to delete a document from current Document Set, Are you sure you want to delete this document?
You are about to delete a Document Set from current Document Set , Are you sure you want to delete this Document Set?
You are about to delete a Document Set Permanently , Are you sure you want to delete this Document Set?
dialog_documentClass_confirmDeleteDocume: You are about to delete Document Class, Are you sure to Delete this Document Class?
dialog_metaDataModel_confirmDeleteMetaDa: You are about to delete Metadata Model, Are you sure you want to Delete this Metadata Model?
documentset_addDocumentSetToSet_title: Select Document Set to be added to current Document Set
documentset_addDocumentsToSet_Content: Select Documents to be added to the Document Set:
downloadDocSteps: click on the download icon to download the document as below :
editeUserProfileStep1: from the upper right corner, click on you avatar then select settings. From settings select Edit User Profile, as below:
editeUserProfileStep2: select the user you want to edit his/her profile then click edit profile. a window will appear allowing you to edit user email, password and phone number.
forgetpassword_enterEmail_msg: To reset password, enter your email
forgetpassword_toContinue_checkMail_msg: To continue, please go ahead and check your mail box

leavemessage: Are you sure you want to leave?
link_adddocumentsettodocumentset: Add Document Set To Document Set
logInStep1: write your Email Address and your password then click SIGNIN.
logoutStep: from the upper right corner,click on your avatar, then select Logout
Mail_con_test: You have to test your configuration and be sure it works.
modifyPasswordStep1: from the upper right corner click on your avatar icon as below:
modifyPasswordStep3: now select 'Change My Password' then provide the old password and the new password with its confirmation then click Save
notaggregated: It is NOT an aggregate model
notcompoundmodel: It is NOT a compound model
opeationsBegining: in order to perform any action on a document you have to search for it via 'Browse Document' from the sidebar.
password_charachters_no: password must be more than 8 characters and less than 12
password_mismatchingWithComfirm: password and confirmed one have mismatch
password_formateError:
Passwords must contain: +a minimum of 1 lower case letter [a - z] and,
 +a minimum of 1 upper case letter [A - Z] and,
 + a minimum of 1 numeric character [0 - 9] and,
 + a minimum of 1 special character,
 +And the password must be at least 8 characters in length.
printDocumentSteps: click on the print icon to print the document as below:
selectLanguageStep1: from the upper right corner click on your avatar then select profile, then select languages. now you can select the language you want.
selectModel_fillInfo: 2.Fill in the required information then click Submit
selectModel_fillInfo_aggr: Fill in the required information make sure to select aggregated metadata model
selectModel_fillInfo_aggr_com: Fill in the required information make sure to select aggregated compound metadata model
selectModel_fillInfo_comp: Fill in the required information make sure to select compound metadata model
sendByEmailStep1: click on email document icon as below:
sendByEmailStep2: in the displayed window you can compose your email.
updateDocumentStep1: select Browse Documents from the sidebar
updateDocumentStep2: You have two options to search for a document,either by free text or by value
updateDocumentStep2_AٍStep1: select the model name, the document class name and the text you want to search for then click search, a table with the results will appear on the page .
updateDocumentStep2_BStep1: select the model name and the attribute name then write the value you want to search for then click search, a table with the results will appear on the page.
updateDocumentStep3: select update from the actions as below:
updateDocumentStep4: Now you can update the fields you want. You can upload a document scan and change the aggregate document if it was aggregated or update the document in the aggregate. Then click Update.
upload_error: You must upload a scanned copy of document!
viewDocumentSteps: click on the view icon to preview the selected document as below :
viewHistoryStep1: click on the view history icon as below:
viewHistoryStep2: now a window will popup conatining a table of all document versions you can view them, email them and update them.
What_Actions_Can_Be_Performed_On_A_Docum: What actions can be performed on a document?
viewAttachments1: Click on the view attachments icon as below
viewAttachments2: A window will appear displaying all the attachments of this document, you can delete,download and update the attachments.
